trans-unit.source: Next we need to add a new class to handle notifications.
trans-unit.target: Next we need to add a new class to handle notifications.

trans-unit.source: In the Project Explorer, open the src => main => java nodes, and right-click the package name node: click New, then click Java Class.
trans-unit.target: In the Project Explorer, open the src => main => java nodes, and right-click the package name node: click New, then click Java Class.

trans-unit.source: In the MyHandler class, add the following code to override the onRegistered method, which registers your device with the mobile service Notification Hub.
trans-unit.target: In the MyHandler class, add the following code to override the onRegistered method, which registers your device with the mobile service Notification Hub.

trans-unit.source: In the MyHandler class, add the following code to override the onReceive method, which causes the notification to display when it is received.
trans-unit.target: In the MyHandler class, add the following code to override the onReceive method, which causes the notification to display when it is received.

trans-unit.source: Back in the TodoActivity.java file, update the onCreate method of the ToDoActivity class to register the notification handler class.
trans-unit.target: Back in the TodoActivity.java file, update the onCreate method of the ToDoActivity class to register the notification handler class.

trans-unit.source: Make sure to add this code after the MobileServiceClient is instantiated.

trans-unit.source: Your app is now updated to support push notifications.
